entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
